#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		int n,i=0,a[100001];
		char str[100002];
		cin>>n>>str;
		while(i<n)
		{
			cin>>a[i++];
		}
		i=0;
		while(str[i])
		{
			char ch=str[i];
			str[i]=str[a[i]-1];
			str[a[i]-1]=ch;
			i++;
		}
		cout<<str<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
